TopicTitle: Lurking since 0.18. Finally bored enough at work to register

Articles.Content: I've been viewing everything in these forums for well over a year and a half now and thought I'd finally join this wonderful community. So here I am and I have included the obligatory biggest monstrosity I have ever created. Got me to Jool and Laythe but I don't think it ended right.
Well, we're glad you joined us, even if it was only out of boredom.
Vanamonde is right! We're glad you joined us!
Thank you very much. I'm 90% sure everything is done out of boredom. I'd check the facts on that but I'm bored.
Welcome to the forums, good sir! Hope to see you around!
Welcome, You will not regret it. I guarantee it.
